Presentation.h2: Businessman & 45th President of the United States
Presentation.p: Accomplished real estate developer and entrepreneur, known for a high-profile career spanning real estate, television, and politics. Served as the 45th President of the United States, focusing on policies to promote economic growth, border security, and America-first initiatives.

p: Served as the 45th President of the United States.
Implemented significant tax reforms through the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017.
Focused on deregulation to stimulate economic growth and reduce bureaucratic hurdles.
Negotiated new trade agreements, including the USMCA, replacing NAFTA.
Led an extensive portfolio of real estate projects, including skyscrapers, hotels, golf courses, and luxury residences.
Expanded global branding efforts, licensing the Trump name for properties and products.
Spearheaded renovations of iconic landmarks like the Wollman Rink in Central Park.
Hosted and produced the hit reality TV show, which aired for 14 seasons.
Popularized the phrase 'You're fired!' as a cultural catchphrase.
Used the platform to expand personal branding and visibility.
